Name: Tip Top Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The lemon zest twist is essential to the fine balance of this vermouth (note; no spirit) cocktail.
History: Recipe adapted from Albert S. Crockett's 1935 Old Waldorf Bar Days .
Nutrition: One serving of Tip Top Cocktail contains 144 calories
